title: Sync Configuration
description: Configure automatic synchronization between the system and databases
pageDescription: Configure permission synchronization parameters between the system and managed databases.
enabledRequired: Automatic synchronization is disabled. You can still start manual synchronizations.

settings.enabledDescription: Activates automatic permission synchronization between the system and connected databases.
settings.retryCountDescription: Number of sync attempts before reporting failure
settings.autoCorrectDescription: Automatically corrects discrepancies found during synchronization
settings.autoRemoveUsersDescription: Automatically removes unmanaged users found in databases
settings.autoRemoveUsersWarning: WARNING: This option automatically removes unmanaged users from databases. Use with extreme caution as this can disrupt other applications that depend on these users.
settings.notifyOnDiscrepancyDescription: Send notification when discrepancies are found during synchronization
settings.notifyOnUnmanagedDescription: Send notification when unmanaged users are found in databases
settings.notificationEmailDescription: Email of the person responsible for receiving alerts about discrepancies and unmanaged users. If not provided, system administrators will be notified.
settings.notificationEmailHelp: Leave blank to notify system administrators.

triggerSyncDialog.title: Start Manual Sync
triggerSyncDialog.message: Select a database and sync direction:

alerts.smtpWarning: WARNING: SMTP configuration check has been temporarily disabled. Notifications may not work properly if SMTP is not configured. It is recommended to configure SMTP in Settings > SMTP as soon as possible.

errors.intervalRequired: Sync interval must be greater than zero
errors.retryCountRequired: Retry count must be greater than zero
